content.text:
Let me analyze this task systematically:

1. Main Target Image Analysis:
- Structure has 4 layers total
- Colors used: Yellow (rectangular base/top blocks), Green, Blue, Red (cubic blocks)
- Layer composition from bottom to top:
   1st Layer (Bottom): Yellow rectangular base
   2nd Layer: Green vertical block, Red cube, Blue cube
   3rd Layer: Yellow rectangular mid-section block
   4th Layer (Top): Yellow rectangular top block

2. Block Dictionary Selection:
Required blocks (by index):
- Block 7 (Green vertical block)
- Block 2 (Red cube)
- Block 1 (Blue cube)
- Block 11 (Yellow horizontal rectangular block for mid-section)
- Block 12 (Yellow horizontal rectangular block for mid-section)
- Block 15 (Yellow rectangular base block)
- Block 16 (Yellow rectangular top block)

3. Assembly Instructions:
{
   Step1: Move block 15 (Yellow base)
   Step2: Move block 1 (Blue cube)
   Step3: Move block 2 (Red cube)
   Step4: Move block 7 (Green vertical block)
   Step5: Move block 11 (Yellow mid-section block)
   Step6: Move block 16 (Yellow top block)
}
